name: Interestellar (2014)
description:
Explore a universe of solar systems and black holes created by users in the game Interstellar. Create and customize your own solar system with planets, moons, asteroids and more. See how far you can fly the Endurance without running out of fuel, passing through solar systems with realistic physics and gravitational forces. Use wormholes to visit new systems and try to survive the biggest challenge of a black hole.

Resources

• Create your own solar system and share it with friends

• Customize planets, stars and asteroids

• Pilot the Endurance through the solar systems of friends and other players

• See how far you can explore without running out of fuel

• Traverse planets and send survey data back to Earth

• Navigate through massive black holes

• Upgrade your ship to increase durability and range

• Earn Quest Achievements by completing objectives

• Based on Newtonian physics with simulated gravitational fields
